attributes.additional_details:
I am appalled & disgusted at the alarming rise in the number of incidents regarding Cats & Dogs being shot with Airguns within residential areas around the UK.

Many Cats & Dogs are being targeted & shot with airguns which causes untold suffering & in most cases a very painful death to the pet involved.

I have created this petition to not only raise awareness of this, but to call on the government to BAN the use of airguns thereby making it harder for unscrupulous individuals to acquire them.
